By continuing to use this site, you agree to our use of cookies and web tracking technologies as described in our Privacy Statement and Cookie Statement.

    Details & Exclusions

    * Non-members receive free standard shipping on orders of at least $25 excluding taxes and shipping costs, and after any applicable coupons have been applied. Western Digital Store members receive free standard shipping on all eligible orders. Free standard shipping (UPS Ground) applies to purchases delivered within the contiguous United States, excluding addresses in Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico and other U.S. territories. Western Digital reserves the right to change or discontinue these terms at any time without notice.

      Cookie Statement

      Last Modified June 25, 2020

      PDF   

       

      This Cookie Statement explains how Western Digital (Western Digital, we, us, or our) uses cookies on our websites, applications, and online services, and the choices you have. 

      Definition Of "Cookies"

      Cookies are small pieces of text used to store information on web browsers.  Cookies are widely used to store and receive identifiers and other information on computers, phones, and other devices.  We also use other technologies, including data we store on your web browser or device, identifiers associated with your device, and other software, including web beacons and pixel tags, for similar purposes.  In this Cookie Statement, we refer to all of these technologies as cookies.

      Types Of Cookies

      We use cookies to provide, protect, and improve our products and services, such as by personalizing content, offering and measuring advertisements, understanding user behavior, and providing a safer experience.  We describe below the various types of cookies we use and the purposes they perform.  Please note that the specific cookies we may use vary depending on the specific websites and services you use.

      • Essential cookies:  These cookies are strictly necessary to provide you with our websites and services and to enable essential features, such as providing shopping cart or product application functionality.  If you disable these cookies, we will not be able to fulfill your requests.
      • Performance and functionality cookies:  These cookies collect information about how you use our websites and services and allow us to remember the choices you make while browsing.  The information these cookies collect allows us to optimize our websites and make them easier for you to use, and it does not personally identify you.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications, and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Analytics and customization cookies:  These cookies collect information we use in aggregate form to help us understand how our websites, applications and services are being used and how effective our marketing campaigns are, and to help us customize our websites.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Advertising cookies:  These cookies collect information about your browsing or shopping history and are used to make advertising messages more relevant to you.  They perform functions like preventing the same advertisement from continuously reappearing, ensuring that advertisements are properly displayed, and in some cases selecting advertisements that are based on your interests.  We may share this information with third parties to help create and deliver advertising personalized to you and your interests.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Social networking cookies:  These cookies are used to enable you to share pages and content on our websites and services through third-party social networking and other websites.  These cookies may also be used for advertising purposes.

      Cookies Placed By Third Parties

      You may also encounter cookies on our websites, applications and services that are placed by third parties.  For example, when you buy our products online, our e-commerce vendor may use cookies and other technologies.  We may also allow third parties to place cookies on our websites to track information about your online activities and/or across third-party sites or online services, including to send you targeted advertisements based on that information, which may include the remarketing of our products and services that you have viewed on our websites and on third-party websites.

      This Cookie Statement does not apply to the cookies, applications, technologies, or websites that are owned and/or operated by third parties, or such third parties practices, even if they use or access our technology to store or collect information.  To understand how third parties use cookies, please review their privacy and cookie policies.

      Interest-Based Advertising

      We utilize third-party service providers to deliver advertising on our sites and to serve ads on third-party sites. This enables us to direct advertisements to you for products and services in which you might be interested (interest-based ads).  We respect the ad industries Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioral Advertising. 

      To learn more or to opt out of interest-based advertisements, you may visit:

      • Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA): http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
      • Network Advertising Initiative (NAI): http://optout.networkadvertising.org
      • In Europe, the European Interactive Digital Adverting Alliance (EDAA): http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/ and http://www.edaa.eu/

      Controlling And Opting Out of Cookies

      Your browser or device may offer settings that allow you to choose whether browser cookies are set and to delete them.  For more information about these controls and to exercise your cookie preferences, visit your browser or devices help material.  If you choose to reject cookies, as noted above, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites and services.

      Do Not Track

      Some browsers include the ability to transmit Do Not Track signals.  We do not process or respond to Do Not Track signals.  Instead, we adhere to the standards described in our Privacy Statement and this Cookie Statement.

      • Cookie Statement

      Cookie Statement

      Last Modified: December 6, 2021

      PDF   

       

      This Cookie Statement explains how Western Digital (Western Digital, we, us, or our) uses cookies and other technologies in our websites, applications, emails, advertisements, and online services, and the choices you have.

      To update your settings, please visit Cookie Preferences.

      Definition Of "Cookies"

      Cookies are small pieces of text dropped on your browser when you visit a website, email, advertisement, or other online service that store information. 

      Pixels (also known as web beacons), are pieces of code embedded in a website, email, application, advertisement, or other online service that sends information about your use to a server. There are various types of pixels, including image pixels (which are small graphic images) and JavaScript pixels (which contain JavaScript code). When you access a location that contains a pixel, the pixel may drop or read cookies on your browser. We also use other technologies, such as software development kits, for similar purposes. 

      In this Cookie Statement, we hereafter refer to all of these technologies as cookies.

      Types Of Cookies

      We use cookies to provide, protect, and improve our products and services, such as by personalizing content, understanding user behavior, and providing a safer experience.  We also use cookies to provide you with personalized advertisements, including on third-party websites and applications, and to determine the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns. We describe below the various types of cookies we use and the purposes they perform.  Please note that the specific cookies we may use vary depending on the specific websites and services you use.

      • Essential cookies:  These cookies are strictly necessary to provide you with our websites and services and to enable essential features, such as providing shopping cart or product application functionality.  If you disable these cookies, we will not be able to fulfill your requests.
      • Performance and functionality cookies:  These cookies collect information about how you use our websites and services and allow us to remember the choices you make while browsing.  The information these cookies collect allows us to optimize our websites and make them easier for you to use, and it does not personally identify you.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications, and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Analytics and customization cookies:  These cookies collect information we use in aggregate form to help us understand how our websites, applications and services are being used and how effective our marketing campaigns are, and to help us customize our websites.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Advertising cookies:  These cookies collect information about your browsing or shopping history and are used to make advertising messages more relevant to you.  They perform functions like preventing the same advertisement from continuously reappearing, ensuring that advertisements are properly displayed, and in some cases selecting advertisements that are based on your interests.  We may share this information with third parties to help create and deliver advertising personalized to you and your interests.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Social networking cookies:  These cookies are used to enable you to share pages and content on our websites and services through third-party social networking and other websites.  These cookies may also be used for advertising purposes.

      Cookies Placed By Third Parties

      You may also encounter cookies on our websites, applications and services that are placed by third parties.  For example, when you buy our products online, our e-commerce vendor may use cookies and other technologies.  We may also allow third parties to place cookies on our websites to track information about your online activities and/or across third-party sites or online services, including to send you targeted advertisements based on that information, which may include the remarketing of our products and services that you have viewed on our websites and on third-party websites.

      This Cookie Statement does not apply to the cookies, applications, technologies, or websites that are owned and/or operated by third parties, or such third parties practices, even if they use or access our technology to store or collect information.  To understand how third parties use cookies, please review their privacy and cookie policies.

      Interest-Based Advertising

      We utilize third-party service providers to deliver advertising on our sites and to serve ads on third-party sites. This enables us to direct advertisements to you for products and services in which you might be interested (interest-based ads).  We respect the ad industries Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioral Advertising (Principles), and work with third-party service providers who participate in the Principles. 

      To learn more or to opt-out of interest-based advertisements, you may visit:

      • Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA): http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
      • Network Advertising Initiative (NAI): http://optout.networkadvertising.org
      • In Europe, the European Interactive Digital Adverting Alliance (EDAA): http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/ and http://www.edaa.eu/

      Opting out only means that the selected participants should no longer deliver certain targeted ads to you, but does not mean you will no longer receive any targeted ads (e.g., in connection with the participants other customers or from other technology services).

      Controlling And Opting Out of Cookies

      To update your settings, please visit Cookie Preferences.

      In addition, your browser or device may offer settings that allow you to choose whether browser cookies are set and to delete them.  For more information about these controls and to exercise your cookie preferences, visit your browser or devices help material.  If you choose to reject cookies, as noted above, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites and services.

      Please note that your opt-out generally will only apply to the specific browser or device from which you opt-out, and may reset if you delete your browser cookies or change your settings.

      Do Not Track

      Some browsers include the ability to transmit Do Not Track signals.  We do not process or respond to Do Not Track signals.  Instead, we adhere to the standards described in our Privacy Statement and this Cookie Statement.

      • Social networking cookies:  These cookies are used to enable you to share pages and content on our websites and services through third-party social networking and other websites.  These cookies may also be used for advertising purposes.

      Cookies Placed By Third Parties

      You may also encounter cookies on our websites, applications and services that are placed by third parties.  For example, when you buy our products online, our e-commerce vendor may use cookies and other technologies.  We may also allow third parties to place cookies on our websites to track information about your online activities and/or across third-party sites or online services, including to send you targeted advertisements based on that information, which may include the remarketing of our products and services that you have viewed on our websites and on third-party websites.

      This Cookie Statement does not apply to the cookies, applications, technologies, or websites that are owned and/or operated by third parties, or such third parties practices, even if they use or access our technology to store or collect information.  To understand how third parties use cookies, please review their privacy and cookie policies.

      Interest-Based Advertising

      We utilize third-party service providers to deliver advertising on our sites and to serve ads on third-party sites. This enables us to direct advertisements to you for products and services in which you might be interested (interest-based ads).  We respect the ad industries Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioral Advertising (Principles), and work with third-party service providers who participate in the Principles. 

      To learn more or to opt-out of interest-based advertisements, you may visit:

      • Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA): http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
      • Network Advertising Initiative (NAI): http://optout.networkadvertising.org
      • In Europe, the European Interactive Digital Adverting Alliance (EDAA): http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/ and http://www.edaa.eu/

      Opting out only means that the selected participants should no longer deliver certain targeted ads to you, but does not mean you will no longer receive any targeted ads (e.g., in connection with the participants other customers or from other technology services).

      Controlling And Opting Out of Cookies

      To update your settings, please visit Cookie Preferences.

      In addition, your browser or device may offer settings that allow you to choose whether browser cookies are set and to delete them.  For more information about these controls and to exercise your cookie preferences, visit your browser or devices help material.  If you choose to reject cookies, as noted above, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites and services.

      Please note that your opt-out generally will only apply to the specific browser or device from which you opt-out, and may reset if you delete your browser cookies or change your settings.

      Do Not Track

      Some browsers include the ability to transmit Do Not Track signals.  We do not process or respond to Do Not Track signals.  Instead, we adhere to the standards described in our Privacy Statement and this Cookie Statement.

      Erklrung zu Cookies

      Letzte nderung: 6. Dezember 2021

      PDF   

       

      Diese Cookie-Hinweise erklren, wie Western Digital (Western Digital, wir, uns oder unser) Cookies und andere Technologien auf unseren Websites sowie in Anwendungen, E-Mails, Werbeanzeigen und Onlinediensten nutzt, und welche Auswahlmglichkeiten Sie diesbezglich haben.

      Um Ihre Auswahl fr unsere Website zu treffen, rufen Sie bitte die Seite Cookie-Einstellungen auf.

      Definition von Cookies

      Cookies sind kleine Textdateien, in denen Ihr Browser Daten speichert, wenn Sie eine Website, E-Mail, Werbeanzeige oder einen anderen Onlinedienst aufrufen. 

      Pixel (auch Tracking-Pixel oder Web Beacons genannt) sind Codezeilen, die in einer Website, E-Mail, Anwendung, Webeanzeige oder einem anderen Onlinedienst implementiert sind und Informationen ber Ihre Nutzung an einen Server senden. Es gibt verschiedene Arten von Pixeln, unter anderem Bildpixel (kleine Grafikdateien) und JavaScript-Pixel (die JavaScipt-Code enthalten). Wenn Sie einen Inhalt aufrufen, der einen Pixel enthlt, hinterlsst der Pixel mglicherweise Cookies oder liest die Cookies in Ihrem Browser aus. Wir verwenden auch andere Technologien wie Software Development Kits fr hnliche Zwecke. 

      In diesen Cookie-Hinweisen werden alle diese Technologien zusammen als Cookies bezeichnet.

      Arten von Cookies

      Wir nutzen Cookies, um unsere Produkte und Dienste zu schtzen und zu verbessern, etwa indem wir Inhalte personalisieren, das Nutzerverhalten nachvollziehen und ein sichereres Benutzererlebnis bereitstellen. Wir nutzen Cookies auch, um Ihnen personalisierte Werbung anzuzeigen, einschlielich auf Drittanbieter-Websites und -Anwendungen, und um die Wirksamkeit unserer Werbekampagnen zu messen. Die verschiedenen Arten von Cookies, die wir verwenden, und welche Zwecke sie ausben, wird im Anschluss erklrt. Bitte beachten Sie, dass die einzelnen Cookies, die wir verwenden, sich je nach Websites oder Diensten, die Sie nutzen, unterscheiden knnen.

      • Technisch notwendige Cookies:Diese Cookies sind unbedingt erforderlich, um Ihnen unsere Websites und Dienste bereitzustellen und grundlegende Funktionen wie einen Warenkorb oder Anwendungsfunktionen zu ermglichen.  Wenn Sie diese Cookies ablehnen, knnen wir Ihre Anfragen nicht erfllen.
      • Leistungs- und Funktionalitts-Cookies: Diese Cookies erfassen Daten ber Ihre Verwendung unserer Websites und Dienste und speichern, welche Entscheidungen Sie beim Browsen treffen.  Mithilfe der Daten, die diese Cookies erfassen, knnen wir unsere Websites optimieren und benutzerfreundlicher gestalten. Die Daten erlauben nicht, Sie persnlich zu identifizieren. Wenn Sie diese Cookies ausschalten oder ablehnen, knnen Sie bestimmte Funktionen unserer Websites, Anwendungen und Dienste mglicherweise nicht nutzen, und wir knnen Ihnen weniger Support oder Informationen bereitstellen.
      • Analyse- und Personalisierungs-Cookies:  Diese Cookies erfassen Daten, die wir in aggregierter Form nutzen, um besser zu verstehen, wie unsere Websites, Anwendungen und Dienste verwendet werden, wie wirksam unsere Marketingkampagnen sind, und die uns helfen, unsere Websites individuell anzupassen. Wenn Sie diese Cookies ausschalten oder ablehnen, knnen Sie bestimmte Funktionen unserer Websites, Anwendungen und Dienste mglicherweise nicht nutzen, und wir knnen Ihnen weniger Support oder Informationen bereitstellen.
      • Werbe-Cookies: Diese Cookies erfassen Daten ber Ihr Browsingverhalten und Ihren Einkaufsverlauf und werden verwendet, um Ihnen relevantere Werbebotschaften anzuzeigen.  Diese Cookies verhindern etwa, dass Ihnen dieselbe Anzeige wiederholt angezeigt wird, stellen sicher, dass Anzeigen ordnungsgem dargestellt werden, und whlen in einigen Fllen Werbeanzeigen aus, die auf Ihren Interessen basieren.  Wir teilen diese Daten mglicherweise mit Drittanbietern, um dazu beizutragen, Anzeigen zu erstellen und auszuliefern, die auf Sie und Ihre Interessen zugeschnitten sind.  Wenn Sie diese Cookies ausschalten oder ablehnen, knnen Sie bestimmte Funktionen unserer Websites, Anwendungen und Dienste mglicherweise nicht nutzen, und wir knnen Ihnen weniger Support oder Informationen bereitstellen.
      • Social-Network-Cokies:  Diese Cookies ermglichen, dass Sie Seiten und Inhalte von unseren Websites und Diensten ber Drittanbieter-Social-Networks und andere Websites teilen. Diese Cookies knnen auch zu Werbezwecken verwendet werden.

      Von Drittanbietern gesetzte Cookies

      Auf unseren Websites, in unseren Anwendungen und Diensten begegnen Sie mglicherweise auch Cookies, die von Drittanbietern gesetzt werden.  Wenn Sie etwa unsere Produkte online kaufen, nutzt unser E-Commerce-Anbieter mglicherweise Cookies und andere Technologien.  Wir knnen Drittanbietern auch erlauben, Cookies auf unseren Websites zu setzen, um Informationen ber Ihre Onlineaktivitten und/oder auf Drittanbieter-Websites oder in Drittanbieter-Onlinediensten zu verfolgen, unter anderem um Ihnen anhand dieser Informationen zielgerichtete Werbung anzuzeigen. Zum Beispiel knnten wir Anzeigen fr Produkte oder Dienste von uns ausspielen, welche Sie auf unseren oder Drittanbieter-Websites angesehen haben.

      Diese Cookie-Hinweise gelten nicht fr die Cookies, Anwendungen, Technologien oder Websites, die Dritten gehren und/oder von Dritten betrieben werden, bzw. fr die Vorgehensweisen von Dritten, selbst wenn diese Dritten unsere Technologie nutzen oder darauf zugreifen, um Daten zu speichern oder zu erfassen. Um zu verstehen, wie Drittanbieter Cookies nutzen, lesen Sie bitte deren Datenschutzerklrung und Cookie-Hinweise.

      Interessenbezogene Werbung

      Wir nutzen Drittanbieterdienste, um auf unseren Websites Werbung auszuspielen sowie Anzeigen auf Drittanbieter-Websites zu zeigen. Das erlaubt uns, Ihnen Anzeigen fr Produkte und Dienste zu zeigen, an denen Sie mglicherweise interessiert sind (interessenbasierte Anzeigen).  Wir respektieren die Selbstregulierungsgrundstze fr nutzungsbasierte Onlinewerbung (Grundstze) und arbeiten mit Drittanbietern zusammen, die sich an den Grundstzen beteiligen. 

      Um mehr darber zu erfahren oder sich von interessensbasierter Werbung abzumelden, rufen Sie folgende Website auf:

      • Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA): http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
      • Network Advertising Initiative (NAI): http://optout.networkadvertising.org
      • Fr Europe die European Interactive Digital Adverting Alliance (EDAA): http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/ und http://www.edaa.eu/

      Wenn Sie sich abmelden, sollten die ausgewhlten Teilnehmer Ihnen bestimmte zielgerichtete Anzeigen nicht mehr zeigen. Das bedeutet jedoch nicht, dass Sie keinerlei zielgerichtete Anzeigen mehr sehen (z. B. in Verbindung mit anderen Kunden der Teilnehmer oder von anderen Technologiedienstleistern).

      Cookies verwalten und ablehnen

      Um Ihre Auswahl fr unsere Website zu treffen, rufen Sie bitte die Seite Cookie-Einstellungen auf.

      Ihr Browser oder Gert bietet mglicherweise auch Einstellungen, mit denen Sie whlen knnen, ob Browsercookies gesetzt werden, bzw. Cookies lschen knnen.  Fr mehr Informationen zu diesen Einstellungsmglichkeiten und um Ihre gewnschten Cookie-Einstellungen einzurichten, beachten Sie bitte die Hilferessourcen Ihres Browsers oder Gerts. Wenn Sie Cookies wie oben erlutert ablehnen, knnen Sie bestimmte Funktionen unserer Websites und Dienste mglicherweise nicht nutzen.

      Bitte beachten Sie, dass Ihre Abmeldung grundstzlich nur fr den einzelnen Browser oder das Gert gilt, ber den oder das Sie sich abmelden. Mglicherweise werden die Einstellungen auch zurckgesetzt, wenn Sie Ihre Browsercookies lschen oder Einstellungen ndern.

      Do Not Track

      Einige Browser untersttzen die Mglichkeit, eine Do Not Track-Aufforderung (Nicht verfolgen) zu bermitteln. Wir ignorieren Do Not Track-Aufforderungen und bearbeiten sie nicht. Stattdessen halten wir uns an die Standards, die in unserer Datenschutzerklrung und diesen Cookie-Hinweisen beschrieben werden.

      VERKLARING INZAKE COOKIES

      Laatst gewijzigd: 6 december 2021

      PDF   

       

      In deze Verklaring inzake cookies wordt uiteengezet hoe Western Digital ('Western Digital', 'we', 'wij', 'ons' of 'onze') gebruikmaakt van cookies en andere technologien op onze websites, in onze toepassingen, e-mails, advertenties en bij onze online diensten, plus de keuzes die u hebt.

       Om een keuze te maken voor onze website gaat u naar uw Cookievoorkeuren.

      Definitie van cookies

      Cookies zijn kleine stukjes tekst die in uw browser worden geplaatst wanneer u een website, e-mail, advertentie of andere online dienst bezoekt die informatie opslaat.

      Pixels (ook wel webbakens genoemd) zijn stukjes code die zijn ingebed in een website,e-mail, toepassing, advertentie of andere online dienst die informatie over uw gebruik naar een server verzendt. Er zijn verschillende soorten pixels, waaronder afbeeldingspixels (kleine grafische afbeeldingen) en JavaScript-pixels (die JavaScript-code bevatten). Wanneer u een locatie opent die een pixel bevat, kan de pixel cookies in uw browser plaatsen of lezen. We gebruiken ook andere technologien, zoals softwareontwikkelingskits, voor vergelijkbare doeleinden.

      In deze Verklaring inzake cookies worden al deze technologien hierna omschreven als 'cookies'.

      Typen cookies

      We gebruiken cookies om onze producten en diensten te leveren, beschermen en verbeteren, bijvoorbeeld door het personaliseren van inhoud, het begrijpen van gebruikersgedrag en het bieden van een veiligere gebruikservaring. We gebruiken ook cookies om u te voorzien van persoonlijke advertenties, waaronder op websites en in toepassingen van derden, en om de effectiviteit van onze promotiecampagnes vast te stellen. Hieronder beschrijven we de verschillende typen cookies die we gebruiken en de doelen waarvoor deze worden gebruikt. Houd er rekening mee dat de specifieke cookies die we mogelijk gebruiken, variren afhankelijk van de specifieke websites en diensten die u gebruikt.

      • Prestatie-en functionaliteitscookies: Deze cookies verzamelen informatie over hoe u gebruikmaakt van onze websites en diensten en stellen ons in staat de keuzen te onthouden die u maakt tijdens het surfen. De informatie die met deze cookies wordt verzameld stelt ons in staat onze websites te optimaliseren en deze gebruiksvriendelijker te maken. Bovendien wordt u niet persoonlijk gedentificeerd. Als u deze cookies uitschakelt of zich hiervoor afmeldt, kunt u mogelijk geen gebruik maken van bepaalde functies van onze websites, toepassingen en diensten en kunnen we mogelijk minder ondersteuning of informatie aan u bieden.
      • Analyse- en aanpassingscookies: Deze cookies verzamelen informatie die we gebruiken in geaggregeerde vorm om beter inzicht te krijgen in hoe onze websites, toepassingen en dienstenworden gebruikt en hoe effectief onze marketingcampagnes zijn, en om ons te helpen onze websites aan te passen. Als u deze cookies uitschakelt of zich hiervoor afmeldt, kunt u mogelijk niet gebruikmaken van bepaalde functies van onze websites, toepassingen en diensten en kunnen we u mogelijk minder ondersteuning of informatie bieden.
      • Reclamecookies: Deze cookies verzamelen informatie over uw surfgedrag of winkelgeschiedenis en worden gebruikt om reclameboodschappen relevanter voor u te maken. Ze vervullen functies zoals voorkomen dat dezelfde advertentie voortdurend terugkomt, ervoor zorgen dat advertenties correct worden weergegeven en in sommige gevallen advertenties selecteren op basis van uw interesses. Mogelijk delen we deze informatie met derden om tehelpen bij het creren en leveren van gepersonaliseerde reclame die specifiek op uw interesses is afgestemd. Als u deze cookies uitschakelt of zich hiervoor afmeldt, kunt u mogelijk niet gebruikmaken van bepaalde functies van onze websites, toepassingen en diensten en kunnen we u mogelijk minder ondersteuning of informatie bieden.
      • Cookies voor sociaal netwerkgebruik: Deze cookies worden gebruikt om u in staat te stellen pagina's en inhoud op onze websites en diensten te delen via sociale netwerken van derden en andere websites. Deze cookies kunnen ook worden gebruikt voor reclamedoeleinden

      Cookies die door derden worden geplaatst

      Mogelijk komt u ook cookies tegen op onze websites, in onze toepassingen en in onze diensten die door derden zijn geplaatst. Alsu bijvoorbeeld onze producten online aanschaft, kan onze e-commerceleverancier gebruikmaken van cookies en andere technologien. We kunnen ook derden toestaan om cookies op onze websites te plaatsen om informatie bij te houden over uw online activiteiten en/of op internetsites of online services van derden, waaronder het verzenden van gerichte advertenties op basis van die informatie, die mogelijk de remarketing omvatten van onze producten en diensten die u hebt bekeken op onze websites en websites van derden.

      Deze Verklaring inzake cookies is niet van toepassing op de cookies, toepassingen, technologien of websites die eigendom zijn van en/of worden gexploiteerd door derden of op de praktijken van dergelijke derden, zelfs indien zij gebruikmaken van of toegang hebben tot onze technologie voor het opslaan of verzamelen van informatie. Als u meer wilt

      Adverteren op basis van interesse

      Wij maken gebruik van externe serviceproviders voor het leveren van advertenties voor onze sites en om advertenties op sites van derden te plaatsen. Zo kunnen wij advertenties voor producten en services aan u richten waarin u mogelijk genteresseerd bent (advertenties op basis van interesse). Wij leven de zelfreguleringsprincipes voor reclame op basis van onlinegedrag van de reclamebranche na ('principes') en werken met externe dienstverleners die deelnemen aan de principes.

      Raadpleeg voor meer informatie over of afmelding voor reclame op basis van interesse:

      • Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA): http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
      • Network Advertising Initiative (NAI): http://optout.networkadvertising.org
      • In Europa: de European Interactive Digital Adverting Alliance (EDAA): http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/ en http://www.edaa.eu/

      Afmelden betekent alleen dat de geselecteerde deelnemers bepaalde gerichte advertenties niet langer aan u mogen leveren, maar betekent niet dat u geen gerichte advertenties meer ontvangt (bijvoorbeeld in verband met de andere klanten van de deelnemers of van andere technologiediensten).

      Besturen en uitschakelen van cookies

      Om een keuze te maken voor onze website gaat u naar uw Cookievoorkeuren.

      Bovendien kan uw browser of apparaat instellingen bieden waarmee u kunt kiezen of browsercookies worden ingesteld of verwijderd. Raadpleeg de Help-functie van uw browser of apparaat voor meer informatie over deze besturingselementen en het instellen van uwvoorkeuren voor cookies. Als u ervoor kiest om cookies te weigeren, zoals hierboven aangegeven, kunt u mogelijk geen gebruik maken van bepaalde functies van onze websites en diensten.

      Houd er rekening mee dat uw afmelding over het algemeen alleen van toepassing is op de specifieke browser of het specifieke apparaat waarop u zich afmeldt en dat uw afmelding kan worden gereset als u uw browsercookies verwijdert of uw instellingen wijzigt.

      Niet bijhouden

      Sommige browsers bieden de mogelijkheid signalen voor 'Niet volgen' uit te zenden. We verwerken geen signalen voor 'Niet bijhouden' en reageren daar ook niet op. In plaats daarvan houden we ons aan de normen die staan beschreven in onze Privacyverklaring en deze Verklaring inzake Cookies.

      Cookie Statement

      Last Modified: December 6, 2021

      PDF   

       

      This Cookie Statement explains how Western Digital (Western Digital, we, us, or our) uses cookies and other technologies in our websites, applications, emails, advertisements, and online services, and the choices you have.

      To update your settings, please visit Cookie Preferences.

      Definition Of "Cookies"

      Cookies are small pieces of text dropped on your browser when you visit a website, email, advertisement, or other online service that store information. 

      Pixels (also known as web beacons), are pieces of code embedded in a website, email, application, advertisement, or other online service that sends information about your use to a server. There are various types of pixels, including image pixels (which are small graphic images) and JavaScript pixels (which contain JavaScript code). When you access a location that contains a pixel, the pixel may drop or read cookies on your browser. We also use other technologies, such as software development kits, for similar purposes. 

      In this Cookie Statement, we hereafter refer to all of these technologies as cookies.

      Types Of Cookies

      We use cookies to provide, protect, and improve our products and services, such as by personalizing content, understanding user behavior, and providing a safer experience.  We also use cookies to provide you with personalized advertisements, including on third-party websites and applications, and to determine the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns. We describe below the various types of cookies we use and the purposes they perform.  Please note that the specific cookies we may use vary depending on the specific websites and services you use.

      • Essential cookies:  These cookies are strictly necessary to provide you with our websites and services and to enable essential features, such as providing shopping cart or product application functionality.  If you disable these cookies, we will not be able to fulfill your requests.
      • Performance and functionality cookies:  These cookies collect information about how you use our websites and services and allow us to remember the choices you make while browsing.  The information these cookies collect allows us to optimize our websites and make them easier for you to use, and it does not personally identify you.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications, and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Analytics and customization cookies:  These cookies collect information we use in aggregate form to help us understand how our websites, applications and services are being used and how effective our marketing campaigns are, and to help us customize our websites.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Advertising cookies:  These cookies collect information about your browsing or shopping history and are used to make advertising messages more relevant to you.  They perform functions like preventing the same advertisement from continuously reappearing, ensuring that advertisements are properly displayed, and in some cases selecting advertisements that are based on your interests.  We may share this information with third parties to help create and deliver advertising personalized to you and your interests.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Social networking cookies:  These cookies are used to enable you to share pages and content on our websites and services through third-party social networking and other websites.  These cookies may also be used for advertising purposes.

      Cookies Placed By Third Parties

      You may also encounter cookies on our websites, applications and services that are placed by third parties.  For example, when you buy our products online, our e-commerce vendor may use cookies and other technologies.  We may also allow third parties to place cookies on our websites to track information about your online activities and/or across third-party sites or online services, including to send you targeted advertisements based on that information, which may include the remarketing of our products and services that you have viewed on our websites and on third-party websites.

      This Cookie Statement does not apply to the cookies, applications, technologies, or websites that are owned and/or operated by third parties, or such third parties practices, even if they use or access our technology to store or collect information.  To understand how third parties use cookies, please review their privacy and cookie policies.

      Interest-Based Advertising

      We utilize third-party service providers to deliver advertising on our sites and to serve ads on third-party sites. This enables us to direct advertisements to you for products and services in which you might be interested (interest-based ads).  We respect the ad industries Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioral Advertising (Principles), and work with third-party service providers who participate in the Principles. 

      To learn more or to opt-out of interest-based advertisements, you may visit:

      • Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA): http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
      • Network Advertising Initiative (NAI): http://optout.networkadvertising.org
      • In Europe, the European Interactive Digital Adverting Alliance (EDAA): http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/ and http://www.edaa.eu/

      Opting out only means that the selected participants should no longer deliver certain targeted ads to you, but does not mean you will no longer receive any targeted ads (e.g., in connection with the participants other customers or from other technology services).

      Controlling And Opting Out of Cookies

      To update your settings, please visit Cookie Preferences.

      In addition, your browser or device may offer settings that allow you to choose whether browser cookies are set and to delete them.  For more information about these controls and to exercise your cookie preferences, visit your browser or devices help material.  If you choose to reject cookies, as noted above, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites and services.

      Please note that your opt-out generally will only apply to the specific browser or device from which you opt-out, and may reset if you delete your browser cookies or change your settings.

      Do Not Track

      Some browsers include the ability to transmit Do Not Track signals.  We do not process or respond to Do Not Track signals.  Instead, we adhere to the standards described in our Privacy Statement and this Cookie Statement.

      Cookie Statement

      Last Modified: December 6, 2021

      PDF   

       

      This Cookie Statement explains how Western Digital (Western Digital, we, us, or our) uses cookies and other technologies in our websites, applications, emails, advertisements, and online services, and the choices you have.

      To update your settings, please visit Cookie Preferences.

      Definition Of "Cookies"

      Cookies are small pieces of text dropped on your browser when you visit a website, email, advertisement, or other online service that store information. 

      Pixels (also known as web beacons), are pieces of code embedded in a website, email, application, advertisement, or other online service that sends information about your use to a server. There are various types of pixels, including image pixels (which are small graphic images) and JavaScript pixels (which contain JavaScript code). When you access a location that contains a pixel, the pixel may drop or read cookies on your browser. We also use other technologies, such as software development kits, for similar purposes. 

      In this Cookie Statement, we hereafter refer to all of these technologies as cookies.

      Types Of Cookies

      We use cookies to provide, protect, and improve our products and services, such as by personalizing content, understanding user behavior, and providing a safer experience.  We also use cookies to provide you with personalized advertisements, including on third-party websites and applications, and to determine the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns. We describe below the various types of cookies we use and the purposes they perform.  Please note that the specific cookies we may use vary depending on the specific websites and services you use.

      • Essential cookies:  These cookies are strictly necessary to provide you with our websites and services and to enable essential features, such as providing shopping cart or product application functionality.  If you disable these cookies, we will not be able to fulfill your requests.
      • Performance and functionality cookies:  These cookies collect information about how you use our websites and services and allow us to remember the choices you make while browsing.  The information these cookies collect allows us to optimize our websites and make them easier for you to use, and it does not personally identify you.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications, and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Analytics and customization cookies:  These cookies collect information we use in aggregate form to help us understand how our websites, applications and services are being used and how effective our marketing campaigns are, and to help us customize our websites.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Advertising cookies:  These cookies collect information about your browsing or shopping history and are used to make advertising messages more relevant to you.  They perform functions like preventing the same advertisement from continuously reappearing, ensuring that advertisements are properly displayed, and in some cases selecting advertisements that are based on your interests.  We may share this information with third parties to help create and deliver advertising personalized to you and your interests.  If you disable or opt out of these cookies, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites, applications and services, and it may reduce the support or information that we can provide you.
      • Social networking cookies:  These cookies are used to enable you to share pages and content on our websites and services through third-party social networking and other websites.  These cookies may also be used for advertising purposes.

      Cookies Placed By Third Parties

      You may also encounter cookies on our websites, applications and services that are placed by third parties.  For example, when you buy our products online, our e-commerce vendor may use cookies and other technologies.  We may also allow third parties to place cookies on our websites to track information about your online activities and/or across third-party sites or online services, including to send you targeted advertisements based on that information, which may include the remarketing of our products and services that you have viewed on our websites and on third-party websites.

      This Cookie Statement does not apply to the cookies, applications, technologies, or websites that are owned and/or operated by third parties, or such third parties practices, even if they use or access our technology to store or collect information.  To understand how third parties use cookies, please review their privacy and cookie policies.

      Interest-Based Advertising

      We utilize third-party service providers to deliver advertising on our sites and to serve ads on third-party sites. This enables us to direct advertisements to you for products and services in which you might be interested (interest-based ads).  We respect the ad industries Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioral Advertising (Principles), and work with third-party service providers who participate in the Principles. 

      To learn more or to opt-out of interest-based advertisements, you may visit:

      • Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA): http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
      • Network Advertising Initiative (NAI): http://optout.networkadvertising.org
      • In Europe, the European Interactive Digital Adverting Alliance (EDAA): http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/ and http://www.edaa.eu/

      Opting out only means that the selected participants should no longer deliver certain targeted ads to you, but does not mean you will no longer receive any targeted ads (e.g., in connection with the participants other customers or from other technology services).

      Controlling And Opting Out of Cookies

      To update your settings, please visit Cookie Preferences.

      In addition, your browser or device may offer settings that allow you to choose whether browser cookies are set and to delete them.  For more information about these controls and to exercise your cookie preferences, visit your browser or devices help material.  If you choose to reject cookies, as noted above, you may not be able to use certain features of our websites and services.

      Please note that your opt-out generally will only apply to the specific browser or device from which you opt-out, and may reset if you delete your browser cookies or change your settings.

      Do Not Track

      Some browsers include the ability to transmit Do Not Track signals.  We do not process or respond to Do Not Track signals.  Instead, we adhere to the standards described in our Privacy Statement and this Cookie Statement.

      PROHLEN O POUVN SOUBOR COOKIE

      Posledn aktualizace: 6. prosince 2021

      PDF   

       

      Toto Prohlen o pouvn soubor cookie vysvtluje, jak spolenost Western Digital (Western Digital, my, ns, nae apod.) pouv soubory cookie a ostatn technologie na naich webech, v aplikacch, e-mailech, reklam a v rmci online slueb, a tak pojednv o vaich monostech jakoto uivatele. 

      Chcete-li upravit nastaven ve vztahu k naemu webu, navtivte Pedvolby soubor cookie.

      Definice souboru cookie

      Soubory cookie jsou mal textov soubory, kter se ukldaj do prohlee pi nvtv webovch strnek, e-mailu, reklamy nebo jinch online slueb, kter ukldaj informace. 

      Pixelov tagy (znm tak jako webov signly) jsou kousky kdu integrovan do webovch strnek, e-mail, aplikac, reklam nebo jinch online slueb, kter na server odeslaj informace o vaem pouvn. Existuj rzn druhy pixelovch tag vetn obrzkovch pixelovch tag (to jsou mal grafick obrzky) a pixelovch tag JavaScript (kter obsahuj kd JavaScript). Vstoupte-li na lokalitu, kter obsahuje pixelov tag, pixelov tag me ve vaem prohlei zanechat soubory cookie nebo je pest. K obdobnm elm vyuvme tak dal technologie, jako nap. sady vvojovch nstroj. 

      V rmci tohoto Prohlen o pouvn soubor cookie oznaujeme vechny tyto technologie jako soubory cookie.

      Druhy soubor cookie

      Soubory cookie pouvme k poskytovn, ochran a vylepovn naich produkt a slueb. Napklad k personalizaci obsahu, pochopen uivatelskho chovn a poskytovn vyho zabezpeen.  Soubory cookie meme tak pouvat k poskytovn personalizovan reklamy, vetn reklamy na webech a v aplikacch tetch stran nebo k uren efektivity naich propaganch kampan. Ne popisujeme rzn druhy soubor cookie, kter pouvme, a tak el, kter pln.  Upozorujeme, e konkrtn pouit soubory cookie se li v zvislosti na konkrtnch strnkch a slubch, kter pouvte.

      • Nezbytn soubory cookie:  Tyto soubory cookie jsou nezbytn nutn pro poskytovn naich webovch strnek a slueb a umouj pouvat zkladn funkce, jako jsou napklad nkupn kok nebo funknost aplikac.  Pokud zakete pouvn tchto soubor cookie, nebudeme moci vydit vae poadavky.
      • Soubory cookie zajiujc vkonnost a funkce:  Tyto soubory cookie shromauj informace o tom, jak pouvte nae webov strnky a sluby, a umouj nm pamatovat si vae volby bhem prohlen.  Informace, kter tyto soubory cookie shromauj, nm umouj optimalizovat nae webov strnky a vm zase usnaduj pouvn naich strnek. Tyto soubory cookie vs pitom osobn neidentifikuj.  Pokud tyto soubory cookie zakete nebo je pestanete pouvat, mon nebudete moci pouvat nkter funkce naich strnek, aplikac a slueb. Tak to me snit mru podpory a zredukovat informace, kter vm budeme schopni poskytnout.
      • Soubory cookie pro analzu a pizpsoben:  Tyto soubory cookie shromauj informace, kter v souhrnn podob pouvme k pochopen zpsobu pouvn naich strnek, aplikac a slueb. Tak pomoc nich zjiujeme, jak efektivn jsou nae marketingov kampan, a pomhaj nm pizpsobovat nae webov strnky jednotlivm uivatelm.  Pokud tyto soubory cookie zakete nebo je pestanete pouvat, mon nebudete moci pouvat nkter funkce naich strnek, aplikac a slueb. Tak to me snit mru podpory a zredukovat informace, kter vm budeme schopni poskytnout.
      • Reklamn soubory cookie:  Tyto soubory cookie shromauj informace o historii vaeho prochzen a nakupovn a pouvaj se k tomu, aby vm byla reklamn sdlen it na mru.  Pln funkce, jako je prevence neustlho zobrazovn stejn reklamy, zajiuj dn zobrazovn reklam a v nkterch ppadech umouj volit reklamy na zklad vaich zjm.  Tyto informace meme pedvat tetm stranm za elem pomoci pi vytven a zobrazovn reklamy, kter je pizpsoben na mru vm a vaim zjmm.  Pokud tyto soubory cookie zakete nebo je pestanete pouvat, mon nebudete moci pouvat nkter funkce naich strnek, aplikac a slueb. Tak to me snit mru podpory a zredukovat informace, kter vm budeme schopni poskytnout.
      • Soubory cookie pro ely socilnch st:  Tyto soubory cookie vm umouj sdlet strnky a obsah na naich webech a v rmci naich slueb prostednictvm socilnch st a dalch web tetch stran.  Tyto soubory cookie mohou tak slouit pro reklamn ely.

      Soubory cookie umstn tetmi stranami

      Na naich webovch strnkch, v naich aplikacch a v rmci naich slueb se mete tak setkat se soubory cookie umstnmi tetmi stranami.  Napklad kdy si kupujete njak produkt online, n dodavatel internetovho obchodu me pouvat soubory cookie a dal technologie.  Meme tak umonit tetm stranm umstit soubory cookie na nae strnky za elem sledovn informac o va aktivit online anebo aktivit na strnkch tetch stran i v rmci online slueb. Na zklad tchto informac vm mohou bt zaslny clen reklamy, kter se mohou tkat optovnho uveden na trh naich produkt a slueb, kter jste si zobrazovali na naich strnkch a na strnkch tetch stran.

      Toto Prohlen o pouvn soubor cookie se netk soubor cookie, aplikac, technologi i web vlastnnch i provozovanch tetmi stranami, ani pslunch postup tetch stran, a to ani v ppad, kdy tyto tet strany pouvaj za elem ukldn i shromaovn informac nae technologie nebo k nim maj pstup.  Chcete-li se dozvdt, jakm zpsobem tet strany pouvaj soubory cookie, seznamte se s jejich zsadami ochrany osobnch daj a pouvn soubor cookie.

      Zjmov orientovan reklama

      K poskytovn reklamy na naich webech a k zobrazovn reklam na strnkch tetch stran vyuvme poskytovatele slueb z ad tetch stran. Dky tomu vm meme zobrazovat reklamy na produkty a sluby, kter by vs mohly zajmat (zjmov orientovan reklamy).  Respektujeme zsady samoregulace reklamnho prmyslu pro online behaviorln reklamu (zsady) a spolupracujeme s poskytovateli slueb z ad tetch stran, kte se na tchto zsadch podlej. 

      Pokud se chcete dozvdt dal informace nebo se z odbru zjmov orientovanch reklam odhlsit, mete navtvit strnky:

      • Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA): http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
      • Network Advertising Initiative (NAI): http://optout.networkadvertising.org
      • V Evrop tak European Interactive Digital Advertising Alliance (EDAA): http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/ a http://www.edaa.eu/

      Odhlen s sebou nese pouze to, e vybran astnci vm ji nebudou zaslat urit clen reklamy. Neznamen to ovem, e se vm ji nebudou zobrazovat clen reklamy (nap. v souvislosti s ostatnmi zkaznky astnk nebo z jinch technologickch slueb).

      Sprva soubor cookie a odmtnut jejich pouvn

      Chcete-li upravit nastaven ve vztahu k naemu webu, navtivte Pedvolby soubor cookie.

      Krom toho me prohle i zazen nabzet nastaven umoujc nastavit, zda se soubory cookie do prohlee ukldaj, a soubory vymazat.  Dal informace o tchto ovldacch prvcch a o pedvolbch soubor cookie najdete v npovd k vaemu prohlei nebo zazen.  Pokud se rozhodnete soubory cookie odmtnout, jak je uvedeno ve, mon nebudete moci pouvat nkter funkce naich webovch strnek i slueb.

      Vezmte prosm na vdom, e odhlen se bude obecn vztahovat pouze na konkrtn prohle nebo zazen, ze kterho jste odhlen provedli. Pokud soubory cookie prohlee odstrante nebo zmnte nastaven, me dojt k jejich obnoven.

      Nesledovat Do Not Track

      Nkter prohlee maj schopnost vyslat signly Do Not Track (Nesledovat).  My signly Do Not Track (Nesledovat) nezpracovvme a ani na n nereagujeme.  Msto toho se dme normou popsanou v naem Prohlen o ochran osobnch daj a tomto Prohlen o pouvn soubor cookie.

      • Cookie-Hinweis
        • Arten von Cookies
        • Von Drittanbietern gesetzte Cookies
        • Cookies verwalten und ablehnen
        • Definition von Cookies
        • Interessenbezogene Werbung
        • Do Not Track

      Cookies sind kleine Textdateien, in denen Ihr Browser Daten speichert, wenn Sie eine Website, E-Mail, Werbeanzeige oder einen anderen Onlinedienst aufrufen. 

      Pixel (auch Tracking-Pixel oder Web Beacons genannt) sind Codezeilen, die in einer Website, E-Mail, Anwendung, Webeanzeige oder einem anderen Onlinedienst implementiert sind und Informationen ber Ihre Nutzung an einen Server senden. Es gibt verschiedene Arten von Pixeln, unter anderem Bildpixel (kleine Grafikdateien) und JavaScript-Pixel (die JavaScipt-Code enthalten). Wenn Sie einen Inhalt aufrufen, der einen Pixel enthlt, hinterlsst der Pixel mglicherweise Cookies oder liest die Cookies in Ihrem Browser aus. Wir verwenden auch andere Technologien wie Software Development Kits fr hnliche Zwecke. 

      In diesen Cookie-Hinweisen werden alle diese Technologien zusammen als Cookies bezeichnet.

      Arten von Cookies

      Wir nutzen Cookies, um unsere Produkte und Dienste zu schtzen und zu verbessern, etwa indem wir Inhalte personalisieren, das Nutzerverhalten nachvollziehen und ein sichereres Benutzererlebnis bereitstellen. Wir nutzen Cookies auch, um Ihnen personalisierte Werbung anzuzeigen, einschlielich auf Drittanbieter-Websites und -Anwendungen, und um die Wirksamkeit unserer Werbekampagnen zu messen. Die verschiedenen Arten von Cookies, die wir verwenden, und welche Zwecke sie ausben, wird im Anschluss erklrt. Bitte beachten Sie, dass die einzelnen Cookies, die wir verwenden, sich je nach Websites oder Diensten, die Sie nutzen, unterscheiden knnen.

      • Technisch notwendige Cookies:Diese Cookies sind unbedingt erforderlich, um Ihnen unsere Websites und Dienste bereitzustellen und grundlegende Funktionen wie einen Warenkorb oder Anwendungsfunktionen zu ermglichen.  Wenn Sie diese Cookies ablehnen, knnen wir Ihre Anfragen nicht erfllen.
      • Leistungs- und Funktionalitts-Cookies: Diese Cookies erfassen Daten ber Ihre Verwendung unserer Websites und Dienste und speichern, welche Entscheidungen Sie beim Browsen treffen.  Mithilfe der Daten, die diese Cookies erfassen, knnen wir unsere Websites optimieren und benutzerfreundlicher gestalten. Die Daten erlauben nicht, Sie persnlich zu identifizieren. Wenn Sie diese Cookies ausschalten oder ablehnen, knnen Sie bestimmte Funktionen unserer Websites, Anwendungen und Dienste mglicherweise nicht nutzen, und wir knnen Ihnen weniger Support oder Informationen bereitstellen.
      • Analyse- und Personalisierungs-Cookies:  Diese Cookies erfassen Daten, die wir in aggregierter Form nutzen, um besser zu verstehen, wie unsere Websites, Anwendungen und Dienste verwendet werden, wie wirksam unsere Marketingkampagnen sind, und die uns helfen, unsere Websites individuell anzupassen. Wenn Sie diese Cookies ausschalten oder ablehnen, knnen Sie bestimmte Funktionen unserer Websites, Anwendungen und Dienste mglicherweise nicht nutzen, und wir knnen Ihnen weniger Support oder Informationen bereitstellen.
      • Werbe-Cookies: Diese Cookies erfassen Daten ber Ihr Browsingverhalten und Ihren Einkaufsverlauf und werden verwendet, um Ihnen relevantere Werbebotschaften anzuzeigen.  Diese Cookies verhindern etwa, dass Ihnen dieselbe Anzeige wiederholt angezeigt wird, stellen sicher, dass Anzeigen ordnungsgem dargestellt werden, und whlen in einigen Fllen Werbeanzeigen aus, die auf Ihren Interessen basieren.  Wir teilen diese Daten mglicherweise mit Drittanbietern, um dazu beizutragen, Anzeigen zu erstellen und auszuliefern, die auf Sie und Ihre Interessen zugeschnitten sind.  Wenn Sie diese Cookies ausschalten oder ablehnen, knnen Sie bestimmte Funktionen unserer Websites, Anwendungen und Dienste mglicherweise nicht nutzen, und wir knnen Ihnen weniger Support oder Informationen bereitstellen.
      • Social-Network-Cokies:  Diese Cookies ermglichen, dass Sie Seiten und Inhalte von unseren Websites und Diensten ber Drittanbieter-Social-Networks und andere Websites teilen. Diese Cookies knnen auch zu Werbezwecken verwendet werden.

      Von Drittanbietern gesetzte Cookies

      Auf unseren Websites, in unseren Anwendungen und Diensten begegnen Sie mglicherweise auch Cookies, die von Drittanbietern gesetzt werden.  Wenn Sie etwa unsere Produkte online kaufen, nutzt unser E-Commerce-Anbieter mglicherweise Cookies und andere Technologien.  Wir knnen Drittanbietern auch erlauben, Cookies auf unseren Websites zu setzen, um Informationen ber Ihre Onlineaktivitten und/oder auf Drittanbieter-Websites oder in Drittanbieter-Onlinediensten zu verfolgen, unter anderem um Ihnen anhand dieser Informationen zielgerichtete Werbung anzuzeigen. Zum Beispiel knnten wir Anzeigen fr Produkte oder Dienste von uns ausspielen, welche Sie auf unseren oder Drittanbieter-Websites angesehen haben.

      Diese Cookie-Hinweise gelten nicht fr die Cookies, Anwendungen, Technologien oder Websites, die Dritten gehren und/oder von Dritten betrieben werden, bzw. fr die Vorgehensweisen von Dritten, selbst wenn diese Dritten unsere Technologie nutzen oder darauf zugreifen, um Daten zu speichern oder zu erfassen. Um zu verstehen, wie Drittanbieter Cookies nutzen, lesen Sie bitte deren Datenschutzerklrung und Cookie-Hinweise.

      Cookies verwalten und ablehnen

      Wir nutzen Drittanbieterdienste, um auf unseren Websites Werbung auszuspielen sowie Anzeigen auf Drittanbieter-Websites zu zeigen. Das erlaubt uns, Ihnen Anzeigen fr Produkte und Dienste zu zeigen, an denen Sie mglicherweise interessiert sind (interessenbasierte Anzeigen).  Wir respektieren die Selbstregulierungsgrundstze fr nutzungsbasierte Onlinewerbung (Grundstze) und arbeiten mit Drittanbietern zusammen, die sich an den Grundstzen beteiligen. 

      Um mehr darber zu erfahren oder sich von interessensbasierter Werbung abzumelden, rufen Sie folgende Website auf:

      • Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA): http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
      • Network Advertising Initiative (NAI): http://optout.networkadvertising.org
      • Fr Europe die European Interactive Digital Adverting Alliance (EDAA): http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/ und http://www.edaa.eu/

      Wenn Sie sich abmelden, sollten die ausgewhlten Teilnehmer Ihnen bestimmte zielgerichtete Anzeigen nicht mehr zeigen. Das bedeutet jedoch nicht, dass Sie keinerlei zielgerichtete Anzeigen mehr sehen (z. B. in Verbindung mit anderen Kunden der Teilnehmer oder von anderen Technologiedienstleistern).

      Erklrung zu Cookies

      Letzte nderung: 6. Dezember 2021

      Diese Cookie-Hinweise erklren, wie Western Digital (Western Digital, wir, uns oder unser) Cookies und andere Technologien auf unseren Websites sowie in Anwendungen, E-Mails, Werbeanzeigen und Onlinediensten nutzt, und welche Auswahlmglichkeiten Sie diesbezglich haben.

      Um Ihre Auswahl fr unsere Website zu treffen, rufen Sie bitte die Seite Cookie-Einstellungen auf.

      Definition von Cookies

      Interessenbezogene Werbung

      Um Ihre Auswahl fr unsere Website zu treffen, rufen Sie bitte die Seite Cookie-Einstellungen auf.

      Ihr Browser oder Gert bietet mglicherweise auch Einstellungen, mit denen Sie whlen knnen, ob Browsercookies gesetzt werden, bzw. Cookies lschen knnen.  Fr mehr Informationen zu diesen Einstellungsmglichkeiten und um Ihre gewnschten Cookie-Einstellungen einzurichten, beachten Sie bitte die Hilferessourcen Ihres Browsers oder Gerts. Wenn Sie Cookies wie oben erlutert ablehnen, knnen Sie bestimmte Funktionen unserer Websites und Dienste mglicherweise nicht nutzen.

      Bitte beachten Sie, dass Ihre Abmeldung grundstzlich nur fr den einzelnen Browser oder das Gert gilt, ber den oder das Sie sich abmelden. Mglicherweise werden die Einstellungen auch zurckgesetzt, wenn Sie Ihre Browsercookies lschen oder Einstellungen ndern.

      Do Not Track

      Einige Browser untersttzen die Mglichkeit, eine Do Not Track-Aufforderung (Nicht verfolgen) zu bermitteln. Wir ignorieren Do Not Track-Aufforderungen und bearbeiten sie nicht. Stattdessen halten wir uns an die Standards, die in unserer Datenschutzerklrung und diesen Cookie-Hinweisen beschrieben werden.

      Declarao sobre Cookies

      ltima modificao: 6 de dezembro de 2021

      PDF   

       

      Esta Declarao de Cookies explica como a Western Digital (Western Digital, ns, nos ou nosso) usa cookies e outras tecnologias em seus sites, aplicativos, e-mails, anncios, servios on-line e as opes que voc tem. 

      Para exercer seu direito de escolha em nosso site, visite Preferncias de Cookies.

      Definio de Cookies

      Cookies so pequenos fragmentos de texto colocados em seu navegador quando voc visita um site, e-mail, anncio ou outro servio on-line que armazena informaes.  

      Pixels (tambm conhecidos como web beacons), so fragmentos de cdigo incorporados a um site, e-mail, aplicativo, anncio ou outro servio on-line que envia informaes sobre seu uso a um servidor. Existem vrios tipos de pixels, como pixels de imagem (que so pequenas imagens grficas) e pixels de JavaScript (que contm cdigo JavaScript). Quando voc acessa um local que contm um pixel, este pode remover ou ler cookies em seu navegador. Tambm usamos outras tecnologias, como kits de desenvolvimento de software, para fins semelhantes. 

      Nesta Declarao de Cookies, doravante nos referimos a todas essas tecnologias como cookies.

      Tipos de cookies

      Usamos cookies para fornecer, proteger e melhorar nossos produtos e servios, por exemplo, personalizando o contedo, entendendo o comportamento do usurio e proporcionando uma experincia mais segura.  Tambm usamos cookies para fornecer a voc anncios personalizados, inclusive em sites e aplicativos de terceiros, bem como para determinar a eficcia de nossas campanhas promocionais. A seguir, descrevemos os vrios tipos de cookies que usamos e as finalidades de cada um.  Observe que os cookies especficos que podemos usar variam de acordo com os sites e servios especficos que voc usa.

      • Cookies essenciais:  Esses cookies so estritamente necessrios para oferecer a voc nossos sites e servios e ativar recursos essenciais, como as funcionalidades de carrinho de compras ou de aplicativo de produto.  Se voc desativar esses cookies, no poderemos atender s suas solicitaes.
      • Cookies de desempenho e funcionalidade:  Esses cookies coletam informaes sobre como voc usa nossos sites e servios e fazem com que lembremos as escolhas que voc faz durante a navegao.  As informaes que esses cookies coletam nos permitem que otimizemos nossos sites e os deixemos ainda mais fceis de usar, e esse processo no o identifica pessoalmente.  Se voc desativar ou optar por no utilizar esses cookies, pode no conseguir usar determinados recursos de nossos sites, aplicativos e servios, e isso pode limitar o suporte ou as informaes que oferecemos.
      • Cookies para anlise e personalizao:  Esses cookies coletam as informaes usadas de forma agregada para que possamos entender como nossos sites, aplicativos e servios esto sendo usados e em que medida nossas campanhas de marketing so eficazes. Esses cookies tambm nos ajudam a personalizar nossos sites.  Se voc desativar ou optar por no utilizar esses cookies, pode no conseguir usar determinados recursos de nossos sites, aplicativos e servios, e isso pode limitar o suporte ou as informaes que oferecemos.
      • Cookies de publicidade:  Esses cookies coletam informaes sobre seu histrico de navegao ou de compras e so usados para tornar as mensagens publicitrias mais interessantes para voc.  Entre as funes que eles desempenham, podemos destacar: impedir que o mesmo anncio reaparea continuamente, garantir que os anncios sejam exibidos corretamente e, em alguns casos, selecionar anncios que se baseiam em seus interesses.  Podemos compartilhar essas informaes com terceiros com a finalidade ajudar a criar e oferecer publicidade personalizada para voc e seus interesses.  Se voc desativar ou optar por no utilizar esses cookies, pode no conseguir usar determinados recursos de nossos sites, aplicativos e servios, e isso pode limitar o suporte ou as informaes que oferecemos.
      • Cookies de redes sociais:  Esses cookies so usados para possibilitar o compartilhamento de pginas e contedo em nossos sites e servios por meio de redes sociais de terceiros e outros sites.  Esses cookies tambm podem ser usados para fins publicitrios.

      Cookies colocados por terceiros

      Voc tambm pode encontrar cookies em nossos sites, aplicativos e servios que so colocados por terceiros.  Por exemplo, quando voc compra nossos produtos on-line, nosso fornecedor de comrcio eletrnico pode usar cookies e outras tecnologias.  Tambm podemos permitir que terceiros coloquem cookies em nossos sites para rastrear informaes sobre suas atividades on-line e/ou em sites de terceiros ou servios on-line, incluindo o envio de anncios direcionados com base nessas informaes, que podem incluir o remarketing dos nossos produtos e servios que voc tenha visualizado em nossos sites e em sites de terceiros.

      Esta Declarao de Cookies no se aplica a cookies, aplicativos, tecnologias ou sites de propriedade e/ou operados por terceiros, ou a prticas de terceiros, mesmo que eles usem ou acessem nossa tecnologia para armazenar ou coletar informaes.  Para entender como os cookies podem ser usados por terceiros, analise suas polticas de privacidade e de cookies.

      Publicidade baseada em interesses

      Utilizamos prestadores de servios terceirizados para oferecer publicidade em nossos sites e veicular anncios em sites de terceiros. Isso permite que direcionemos anncios a voc que ofeream produtos e servios nos quais voc possa estar interessado (anncios com base em interesses).  Respeitamos os Princpios de Autorregulamentao do Setor Publicitrio para Publicidade Comportamental On-line (Princpios) e trabalhamos com prestadores de servios terceirizados que observam esses Princpios.

      Para saber mais ou para optar por no receber anncios com base em interesses, voc pode visitar:

      • Aliana Digital da Publicidade (DAA): http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
      • Iniciativa da Publicidade em Rede (NAI): http://optout.networkadvertising.org
      • Na Europa, a Aliana da Publicidade Digital Interativa Europeia (EDAA): http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/ and http://www.edaa.eu/

      Optar por no receber significa apenas que os participantes selecionados no devem mais oferecer determinados anncios direcionados a voc, mas no significa que voc no receber mais anncios direcionados (por exemplo, em relao a outros clientes dos participantes ou de outros servios de tecnologia).

      Controlando e optando por no usar cookies

      Para exercer seu direito de escolha em nosso site, visite Preferncias de Cookies.

      Alm disso, seu navegador ou dispositivo pode oferecer configuraes que permitem determinar se os cookies do navegador sero instalados e se sero excludos.  Para obter mais informaes sobre esses controles e para usar suas preferncias de cookies, visite seu navegador ou o material de ajuda do dispositivo.  Se voc optar por excluir cookies, conforme observado acima, pode no conseguir usar determinados recursos de nossos sites e servios.

      Observe que a excluso feita geralmente se aplica apenas ao navegador ou no prprio dispositivo em que voc fez essa escolha, e pode ser redefinida se voc excluir os cookies do navegador ou alterar suas configuraes.

      No rastrear

      Alguns navegadores incluem a capacidade de transmitir sinais No rastrear.  No processamos ou respondemos aos sinais No rastrear.  Em vez disso, aderimos aos padres descritos em nossa Declarao de Privacidade e nesta Declarao de Cookies.

      DECLARACIN SOBRE COOKIES

      ltima modificacin: 6 diciembre 2021

      PDF   

       

      Esta Declaracin sobre cookies explica cmo Western Digital (Western Digital, nosotros, nuestro(a)(s) o a nosotros) usa cookies y otras tecnologas en nuestros sitios web, aplicaciones, correos electrnicos, anuncios y servicios en lnea y las opciones con las que cuenta.

      Para ver sus elecciones para nuestro sitio web, visite sus Preferencias relativas al uso de cookies.

      Definicin de cookies

      Las cookies son pequeos fragmentos de texto colocados en su navegador cuando visita un sitio web, correo electrnico, anuncio u otro servicio en lnea que almacena informacin.

      Los pxeles (tambin conocidos como balizas), son fragmentos de cdigo incrustados en un sitio web, correo electrnico, aplicacin, anuncio y otros servicios en lnea que envan informacin sobre su uso a un servidor. Existen varios tipos de pxeles, incluidos pxeles de imgenes (que son pequeas imgenes grficas) y pxeles de JavaScript (que contienen cdigo de JavaScript). Cuando accede a una ubicacin que contiene un pxel, ste puede colocar o leer cookies en su navegador. Tambin utilizamos otras tecnologas, tales como kits de desarrollo de software, con fines similares.

      En esta Declaracin sobre cookies nos referimos en adelante a todas estas tecnologas como cookies.

      Tipos de cookies

      Utilizamos cookies para ofrecer, proteger y mejorar nuestros productos y servicios, por ejemplo, personalizando el contenido, entendiendo el comportamiento de los usuarios y proporcionando una experiencia ms segura.Tambin usamos cookies para proporcionarle anuncios personalizados, incluso en aplicaciones y sitios web de terceros, y para determinar la eficacia de nuestras campaas promocionales. Describimos a continuacin los diferentes tipos de cookies que utilizamos y los propsitos que cumplen.Tengaen cuenta que las cookies especficas que podemos utilizar varan segn los sitios web y los servicios especficos que utiliza.

      • Cookies esenciales: Estas cookies son estrictamente necesarias para proporcionarle nuestros sitios web y servicios, as como para habilitar funciones esenciales, como proporcionar el carrito de compras o la funcionalidad de las aplicaciones del producto.Si desactiva estas cookies, no podremos cumplir sus solicitudes.Cookiesderendimientoyfuncionalidad:Estas cookies recogen informacin acerca de cmo usa nuestros sitios web y servicios, y nos permiten recordar las opciones que elige mientras navega.La informacin que estas cookies recogen nos permite optimizar nuestros sitios web y facilitar su uso y no lo identifica personalmente.Si desactiva o rechaza estas cookies, es posible que no pueda usar determinadas funciones de nuestros sitios web, aplicaciones y servicios. Adems, puede reducir el soporte o la informacin que podemos proporcionarle.
      • Cookies de rendimiento y funcionalidad: Estas cookies recogen informacin que utilizamos en forma agregada para ayudarnos a entender cmo se utilizan nuestros sitios web, aplicaciones y servicios, y cun efectivas son nuestras campaas de marketing, adems de ayudarnos a personalizar nuestros sitios web.Si desactiva o rechaza estas cookies, es posible que no pueda usar determinadas funciones de nuestros sitios web, aplicaciones y servicios. Adems, puede reducir el soporte o la informacin que podemos proporcionarle. 
      • Cookies publicitarias: Estas cookies recogen informacin sobre su historial de navegacin o de compras y se utilizan para hacer que los mensajes publicitarios sean ms relevantes para usted.Realizan funciones como evitar que el mismo anuncio publicitario vuelva a aparecer de manera continua, lo que garantiza que los anuncios se muestren correctamente y, en algunos casos, seleccionan anuncios que se basan en sus intereses.Es posible que compartamos esta informacin con terceros para ayudar a crear y ofrecer publicidad personalizada para usted y sus intereses.Si desactiva o rechaza estas cookies, es posible que no pueda usar determinadas funciones de nuestros sitios web, aplicaciones y servicios. Adems, puede reducir el soporte o la informacin que podemos proporcionarle.
      • Cookies de redes sociales: Estas cookies se utilizan para permitirle compartir pginas y contenido en nuestros sitios web y servicios a travs de redes sociales de terceros y otros sitios web.Estas cookies tambin pueden utilizarse con fines publicitarios.

      Cookies colocadas por terceros

      Tambin puede encontrar cookies en nuestros sitios web, aplicaciones y servicios que son colocados por terceros.Por ejemplo, cuando compra nuestros productos en lnea, nuestro proveedor en comercio electrnico puede utilizar cookies y otras tecnologas.Tambin podemos permitir que terceros coloquen cookies en nuestros sitios web para realizar un seguimiento de informacin sobre sus actividades en lnea o a travs de sitios o servicios en lnea de terceros, incluido el envo de anuncios publicitarios especficos basados en esa informacin, la cual puede incluir el marketing reiterado de nuestros productos y servicios que ha visto en nuestros sitios web y en sitios web de terceros.

      Esta Declaracin sobre cookies no se aplica a las cookies, aplicaciones, tecnologas o sitios web que son propiedad de terceros o que operan terceros, o las prcticas de dichos terceros, incluso si usan o acceden a nuestra tecnologa para almacenar o recoger informacin.Para comprender cmo los terceros utilizan cookies, revise sus polticas de privacidad y cookies.

      Publicidad en Base a Intereses

      Utilizamos proveedores de servicios externos para ofrecer publicidad en nuestros sitios y para publicar anuncios en sitios externos. Esto nos permite dirigir anuncios hacia usted sobre productos y servicios en los que podra estar interesado (anuncios en base a intereses).  Respetamos los Principios de Autorregulacin para la Publicidad Conductual en Lnea de la industria publicitaria (Principios) y trabajamos con proveedores de servicios externos que aceptan estos Principios. 

      Para saber ms o dejar de recibir anuncios en base a intereses, puede visitar:

      • Alianza de Publicidad Digital (DAA): http://www.aboutads.info/choices/
      • Iniciativa de Publicidad en la Red (NAI): http://optout.networkadvertising.org
      • En Europa, la Alianza Europea de Publicidad Interactiva y Digital (EDAA): http://www.youronlinechoices.eu/ and http://www.edaa.eu/

      Dejar de recibir solo significa que los participantes seleccionados no deberan continuar envindole ciertos anuncios especficos, pero no significa que ya no recibir ningn tipo de anuncio especfico (por ejemplo, relacionado con otros clientes del participante o de otros servicios tecnolgicos).

      Control y rechazo de cookies

      Para ver sus elecciones para nuestro sitio web, visite sus Preferencias relativas al uso de cookies.

      Adems, su navegador o dispositivo puede ofrecer configuraciones que le permiten elegir si las cookies del navegador estn configuradas y eliminarlas.Para obtener ms informacin sobre estos controles y para ejercer sus preferencias de cookies, visite elmaterial de ayuda de su navegador o dispositivo.Si elige rechazar las cookies, como se indic anteriormente, es posible que no pueda usar ciertas funciones de nuestros sitios web y servicios.

      Tenga en cuenta que su opcin de dejar de almacenar cookies solo se aplicar al navegador o dispositivo especfico desde el cual estableci la opcin y podr restablecerse si borra las cookies del navegador o cambia sus ajustes.

      No realizar seguimiento

      Algunos navegadores incluyen la capacidad de transmitir seales No realizar seguimiento. No procesamos o respondemos a seales No realizar seguimiento. En su lugar, cumplimos las normas descritas en nuestra Declaracin de privacidad y esta Declaracin sobre cookies.
